mapper.select: SELECT coach_password FROM coach_user WHERE coach_user_email=#{coachEmail} AND coach_password_answer =#{coachPasswordAnswer};
SELECT coach_user_email FROM coach_user WHERE coach_name = #{coachName} AND coach_mobile = #{coachMobile}

SELECT coach_user_email ,coach_password ,coach_password_answer , coach_profile_picture , coach_name , coach_birth , coach_addr , coach_addr_detail , coach_gender , coach_mobile , coach_authority , coach_job , coach_profile_career , coach_profile_tech_stack , coach_certificate , coach_career_documentary_evidence , coach_certificate_documentary_evidence , coach_is_receive_marketing FROM coach_user WHERE coach_user_email = #{coachEmail};

SELECT coach_user_email AS coachEmail , coach_password AS coachPassword , coach_name AS coachName , coach_birth AS coachBirth , coach_addr AS coachAddr , coach_addr_detail AS coachAddrDetail , coach_gender AS coachGender , coach_mobile AS coachMobile , coach_authority AS coachAuthority , coach_job AS coachJob , coach_profile_career AS coachProfileCareer , coach_profile_tech_stack AS coachProfileTechStack , coach_certificate AS coachCertificate , coach_career_documentary_evidence AS coachCareerDocumentaryEvidence , coach_certificate_documentary_evidence AS coachCertificateDocumentaryEvidence , coach_join_approval AS coachJoinApproval , coach_approver_email AS coachApproverEmail , coach_is_receive_marketing AS coachIsReceiveMarketing , coach_join_motivation AS coachJoinMotivation , coach_join_path AS coachJoinPath , coach_recommend_email AS coachRecommendEmail , coach_join_date AS coachJoinDate , coach_withdraw_status AS coachWithdrawStatus FROM coach_user
